dict.acceptation: 限制；局限；极限；起限制作用的规则（或事实、条件）；

sent.orig: Right? Thought can never be free from its limitation because it is born out of limitation.
sent.trans: 对吗？思想永远不能从他的局限中获得自由因为它出身于局限。

sent.orig: The system of limitation on intellectual property is made of interior and exterior limitation on rights.
sent.trans: 知识产权的权利限制体系由知识产权的内部限制和外部限制构成。

sent.orig: Discover oneself limitation, admit oneself limitation, always come well than be being importuned blindly.
sent.trans: 发现自己的局限性，接纳自己的局限性，总比一味强求来得好。

sent.orig: This is more than a limitation of Chopin's thought; it is a limitation of the epoch.
sent.trans: 这不仅是肖邦个人思想的局限，也是特定社会背景下历史的局限。

sent.orig: Because the remote sensing applications demand time limitation of data, images compression system demands time limitation.
sent.trans: 由于遥感应用在很大程度上要求数据的时限性，所以对于图像压缩系统的时限性要求也通常很高。
